text: 20|123|Tē'ōm̐ ka’lē, ‘tōmālōkē ubhaẏē ēkēlagē jānnātara paraā nāmi yōraā. Tōmālōkē parasparaē parasparara śatrau. Sēẏē yadi mōra taraphara paraā tōmālōkara ōcarata saṯpathara nirdēśa āhi pāẏa yiẏē mōra pradarśita saṯpathara anusaraṇa karaiba si bipathagāmī naha’ba ārau durdaśāgrasta'ō naha’ba.
